item.title: 墨子巡天望远镜本体顺利通过出所验收
The first discovery of the hysteresis effect of optical iron emission in the TDE event
item.description: A team leaded by Prof. Tinggui Wang from the Department of astronomy, University of science and technology of China first detected the hysteresis effect of optical iron emission in the TDE event.
